text.text: Getting started with any playthrough of the Lost Worlds mod is like any other mod. Of course, you start with the absolute basics, getting wood. After that, you'll most likely not notice anything, execpt the odd fossil. If you make well use of your first day, you should have the basic setup.

If you wish to start off with the paleontology branch of the mod, it is in your interest to find a Black Market structure. In the hidden room, you'll likly find a hammer. This hammer with be your best friend
